channel.title: Google Earth Engine on csaybar
channel.description: Recent content in Google Earth Engine on csaybar

item.title: Download the GLC30 product for Peru and Ecuador
item.description: Land Cover information is fundamental for environmental change studies, land resource management, sustainable development, and many other societal benefits. In Google Earth Engine existing different coarse Land use/cover products (e.g.Â MCD12Q1-500m) that are not able to capture the most significant human impacts on land systems due to its spatial resolution. Therefore, this short post aims to introduce and explain step by step how to download the GLC30 a relative new Global Land Cover product at 30-meter spatial resolution.
